name: location
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool g_search.
Tool description: Web search API using best search engine
API description: The Location API lets you search for supported Google search locations. You can pass the `location_name` returned by the Location API as the `location_name` parameter and set the `location_parameters_auto` value to true in a Search API query to retrieve search results localized to that location.

location_name.description: The name of the location to search for.

country_code.description: The country code for the search location, default is 'GB'.
